credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Pair of Scissors with Handles Formed by Half-figures of Opposite Facing Lion-headed Sphinxes.
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Pen and  brown ink, brush and gray wash on heavy off-white paper
description: Vertical rectangle showing a design for a pair of scissors with handles formed by half-figures of lion-headed sphinxes, facing in opposite directions.
name: Drawing
